member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: Represents service for stroring records with the ability to add, edit and find some of them.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates new record and adds its to the list.
member.param: First Name of record to create.
Last Name of record to create.
Date of Birth of record to create in format "yyyy-MMM-dd".
Height of record to create in centimeters.
Gender of created record. 'M' is for Male, 'F' is for Female.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets a copy of array of current created records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the information about the amount of current existing records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Edits existing record by it's Id.
member.param: Id of existing record to find by.
new First Name of existing record.
new Last Name of existing record.
new Date of Birth of existing record in format "yyyy-MMM-dd".
new Height of existing record in centimeters.
new Gender of existing record. 'M' is for Male, 'F' is for Female.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Searches records by First Name in curent records using special 'firstNameDictionary' dictionary.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Searches a records by Last Name in curent records using special 'lastNameDictionary' dictionary.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBith(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Searches a records by Date of birth in curent records using special 'dateOfBirthDictionary' dictionary.
member.param: Date of Birth to search by, in format "yyyy-MMM-dd".
